attributes.action:
CHANGE THE LAW TO LIFE FOR
SEX CRIMES COMMITTED ON OUR CHILDREN BY  PEDOPHILES
attributes.additional_details: Pedophilia is a sickness of the mind and no short sentence is going to stop them from hurting our children over and over again it destroys the victims soul they don't have a life anymore they just exist it effects every area of their life, their personal and working relationships it stays with them for the rest of their lifes it takes their lifes victims only exist after being secually abused it totally destroys that person in every area of their llfes right through adulthood
attributes.background: All pedophiles who committ sex crimes on children under the age of 16 to serve life in prison. Children of sexual abuse even with therapy can never move on they have lost their lives they just exist and our children need to be protected from them every child deserves a life free of  sexual violation

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304563
